change.changenote: Section 21 definition of "registered biology technologist" was added by BC Reg 99/2020, effective May 4, 2020.
Section 21 (2) (a) (vi.1) was added by BC Reg 99/2020, effective May 4, 2020.
Section 21 (1) BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 11/2021, effective February 5, 2021.

bcl:definition.bcl:text: agrologist has the same meaning as in the Agrologists Act;
applied science technologist or technician means a person who holds a certificate of registration under the Applied Science Technologists and Technicians Act;
professional biologist has the same meaning as in the College of Applied Biology Act;
professional engineer has the same meaning as in the Engineers and Geoscientists Act;
professional forester has the same meaning as in the Foresters Act;
professional geoscientist has the same meaning as in the Engineers and Geoscientists Act;
registered biology technologist has the same meaning as in the College of Applied Biology Act;
registered forest technologist has the same meaning as in the Foresters Act.

change.changenote: Section 21 (2) (a) and (b) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 11/2021, effective February 5, 2021.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: the individual is one of the following professionals:
the individual is registered and in good standing in British Columbia with the appropriate professional association constituted under an Act for the individual's profession, and

change.changenote: Section 21 (2) (c) (iii) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 11/2021, effective February 5, 2021.

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: under the code of ethics of the appropriate professional association and is subject to disciplinary action by that professional association.

change.changenote: Section 21 (2) (a) (iv) and (vi) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 32/2023, effective February 10, 2023.

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: a professional engineer or professional engineering licensee;
a professional geoscientist or professional geoscience licensee,
